title.narrative: Entrepreneurship and SME Development in Kosovo

description.narrative: Students and recent graduates, Unemployed youth, SMEs and enterprises in general, Education institutions (Vocational High Schools and Universities). Central Government i.e. Ministry of Education, Local Government (Municipalities) as well as, International Community Associations and chambers of commerce, Financial institutions that will enable bigger utilization of their funds.

mailing-address.narrative: Business Start-up Centre Kosovo Str Mother theresa 20 10000 pristina PRISTINA Kosovo (XK)

recipient-country.narrative: Kosovo Do not use !!! use other Kosovo
